Getting Started


Computer Configuration and Registration!

DNS Configuration

Accessing ModernTLD Websites, including our registration pages, requires changing your DNS settings on your computer. Don’t worry, these steps are easy: Just follow these simple steps and you’ll be on your way!


Step 1. Choose your DNS servers! You can use the following two:

  • 138.197.25.214
  • 52.173.73.208

Or you can grab two random ones from this list, it doesn’t matter.


Step 2. Follow one of these guides to change your settings.

  • Windows 7, 8, 10
  • MacOS
  • Ubuntu Desktop
  • Ubuntu Terminal
  • Android (No Root)
  • DD-WRT Routers
  • pfSense
  • Windows DHCP Server 2016

Recommended Next Steps

Join us on IRC

Join us on Freenode at #ModernTLD! Click here for more information or to use our simple webchat.

Webserver Operators:

Domain Registration

Reserve your space on the OpenNIC alt-root network with your very own “.o” domain! This allows you to easily access your webservers when using a computer that utilizes the OpenNIC DNS infrastructure. Registration is 100% free! Register

ModernTLD

ModernTLD provides free domain registration on the OpenNIC network. Check out our site to learn more on how to connect to OpenNIC and get your very own domain for free!
